# CLLocationButtonIcon.none

**Case**

A style that doesn’t display an icon.

## Declaration

```swift
case none
```

## Discussion

Use a different icon style if [doc://com.apple.CoreLocationUI/documentation/CoreLocationUI/CLLocationButton/label] is [doc://com.apple.CoreLocationUI/documentation/CoreLocationUI/CLLocationButtonLabel/none].

## Customizing icon styles

- **CLLocationButtonIcon.arrowFilled**: A style that displays a filled arrow icon.
- **CLLocationButtonIcon.arrowOutline**: A style that displays an unfilled, outline arrow icon.
